pages.text: There are some useful items that come along with Imbuing that are worth knowing about. You may not be able to utilise them at the start of your $(thing)Imbuing$() journey, but in time they will become quite useful
pages.title: Useful Items

pages.text: Power Stones come in a number of varieties, differing in rarity and power level
pages.title: Power Stones

pages.text: $(thing)Power Stones$() are the base of most Imbuing actions. These are crystallised stones of highly concentrated natural energies, which can then be extracted for use.$(br2)$(thing)Power Stones$() are usually obtained from harvesting $(thing)Pixons$(), but can occasionally be obtained from other places

$(thing)Energy Stones$() are similar to $(thing)Power Stones$(), except they don't contain much raw power. They're not useful for anything that requires the raw power of $(thing)Power Stones$(), but can still be consumed to learn more about the energy
pages.title: Energy Stones

pages.text: Given the extensive need for $(thing)Power Stones$() for $(thing)Imbuing$(), you'll need to be able to harvest $(thing)Pixons$() somehow.$(br)The $(thing)Attuning Bowl$() is the only way of doing this currently.$(br)Stand under the fountaining energies of a $(thing)Pixon$() while holding use on the bowl to gather and attune its energies into stones
